EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response confirmation Support Request New - General (Authenticated)
EmailTemplate.name: TFS: New Support Request - General (Authenticated)
EmailTemplate.subject: Toyota Financial Services Support Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact}:
Thank you for contacting Toyota Financial Services. We have received your message in our secure Support Center and we will respond within 2 business days. You will receive an email notification when a response has been posted.
We value your business and look forward to serving your needs. Thank you for visiting us at www.ToyotaFinancial.com.
Sincerely, Toyota Financial Services Customer Support
This is a no reply email notification. Replies initiated from this email will neither be delivered nor answered. If you have additional questions, please log in to the Support Center for further assistance.
